title: Brazilian Authorities Signal Intent to Focus on Vale Executives in Probe of Dam Collapse
text:
BELO HORIZONTE, Brazil—Brazilian police believe top executives and managers at Vale SA deliberately shielded themselves from incriminating information about the state of the company’s dam that collapsed in January to avoid liability, according to a copy of a police inquiry reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.

Studies conducted by Vale’s own consultants in the 12 months preceding the disaster, which killed 270 people, showed the structure was fragile and would eventually collapse, Brazil’s federal police said in a 215-page...
